algorithm_technique: Difference array / prefix sum for population changes
problem_summary_simple: Find the earliest year with the highest population based on birth and death logs.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a difference array to track population changes at birth and death years, then computes prefix sums to find yearly populations.
key_insights: The problem can be solved efficiently by tracking population increments and decrements.
A difference array (or frequency array) is suitable for this.
Prefix sums then reveal the actual population for each year.
